title: How do i change the language?
body: Hello guys, i play on EUNE, and i want to play the japanese version, but its not in the EUNE languages. I know its possible, so i would aprreciate your help.

replies.body: Each region has their own set of supported languages, per our[ language guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  It's not currently possibly to select a language outside of what's supported in your region, and Japan is currently the only location that supports Japanese.  Sorry, friend!
Ehm, i already looked it up on youtube and did it. Well, ty for your comment!
Word, just keep in mind we can't support modifications if you run into any issues.  If you get crashes or run into problems, you'll want to restore your game files!
Yeah, if anything happens, i try to change it back the same way, if that doesnt work, i use the repair button, and if even that fails, i just reinstall it.
